name: frameplayer
description: Stream pixel data from video files

scripts.build: rm -rf dist/ && pbjs -t static-module -w es6 -o src/proto.js proto/*.proto && pbts -o src/proto.d.ts src/proto.js && tsc && tsc --declaration false --allowJs true && chmod +x dist/cli.js
scripts.prepare-example: ts-node --files src/cli.ts prepare examples/input.mp4 -o examples/output.fpl -c examples/frameplayer.json

author: Kevin Montag <kmontag@cs.stanford.edu>
